headline: Verizon Drops 6.2% in Six Months: Should You Buy the Dip?
summary: VZ slide reflects margin and demand pressures, but rising wireless momentum and expanding fiber assets offer notable counterweights.

raw.headline: Verizon Drops 6.2% in Six Months: Should You Buy the Dip?
raw.summary: VZ slide reflects margin and demand pressures, but rising wireless momentum and expanding fiber assets offer notable counterweights.

headline: Obsidian Security Ranked Among the Fastest-Growing Companies in North America on the 2025 Deloitte Technology Fast 500™
summary: PALO ALTO, Calif., November 19, 2025--Obsidian Security, leader in SaaS security, today announced it ranked No. 95 on the 2025 Deloitte Technology Fast 500™, a ranking of the 500 fastest-growing technology, media, telecommunications, life sciences, fintech, and energy tech companies in North America. Obsidian Security grew close to 1000% during the 2021–2024 period.
